headline: Trump’s Pick for Wall Street Prosecutor Will Keep Apollo Stock
summary: (Bloomberg) -- President Donald Trump’s pick to police Wall Street’s financial crimes plans to hang onto holdings in Apollo Global Management, American Express and a digital asset platform, according to documents released Friday by the Office of Government Ethics. headline: 2 Warren Buffett Stocks That Could Double by 2030
summary: At a time when market volatility is rearing its ugly head again, Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway is a great place to find solid investments.  Berkshire held a stock portfolio worth $271 billion at the end of 2024.  It holds stakes in several quality growth stocks that were either selected by Buffett or one of his investing deputies (Todd Combs or Ted Weschler).
